name: Christopher_Knight_Home_Samedi_PU_Leather_Recliner_Club_Chair
reviews: The chair was a very good bargain. It's very comfortable. I wish it was just wider.
Smaller than it looks in the pictures, but it's still pretty comfortable. If you're a big person, look for a bigger chair.

Chair is nice- but smaller than I thought.. More of a petite - feminine chair. My husband wouldn't be able to sit in it... But nice for my daughter and me. Not really a napping chair- but comfortable to be awake in.
description:
The Christopher Knight Home Samedi recliner club chair is a
wonderful addition to any room. Available in select colors, this
recliner enjoys a classic look, while still keeping its clean lines
and simple feel. Includes: One (1) recliner club chairMaterials: PU leather, woodColor options: Black, red, or whiteFinish: BlackAssembly required: YesWeight: 64-poundsDimensions: 42 inches high x 26 inches wide x 35.75 inches
  deepSeat dimensions: 18 inches high x 19.25 inches wide x 20.25
  inches deepArmrest dimensions: 21.50 inches highFurniture Pattern: SolidChair Type: ReclinersStyle: Casual, Modern, TraditionalMaterial: Faux Leather, WoodAssembly: Assembly RequiredExact Color: White, Red, BlackColor: White, Red, BlackStyleCasual, Modern, TraditionalMaterialFaux Leather, WoodChair TypeReclinersAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBlack, Red, WhiteFurniture PatternSolid
